description:
Welcome to the world of Gielinor! Are you here to stake a vampire? Slay a dragon? Battle an Evil Chicken? The choice is in your hands. Regardless of your  decision, there is adventure in your future. Also possibly a good dose of mayhem and havock. RuneScape Kingdoms: Shadow of Elvarg is a cooperative campaign exploration […]

Source
title: RuneScape Kingdoms: Shadow of Elvarg Review
